title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 111.2 - Advisory council
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 111.2 - Advisory council

State Regulations

The advisory council shall advise the executive director on
the entire operation of the New York State Summer School of the Arts and shall
assure that the program offered to the students represents the highest
professional quality. Council members will meet bi-monthly with the executive
director of the residence schools to review plans, monitor progress and make
recommendations for program improvement. Council members shall visit the
schools during their operating period and inspect all
facilities. Notes

111.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
